content: This is a reminder/notification that we have made changes in the IPS and IPA calls beginning tomorrow. The IPS call will begin at our previous normal time of 11:00 AM EDT (15:00 UTC, 17:00 CEST), immediately following the IPA call. These updates have now been made on the HL7 calendar, and beginning next week the automatic reminders will also be correct. For the IPA call details, see this topic.
